issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.11:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fbfbfb.
issues.description: on 2018/10/27 23:53

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.11:1. Recommendation:  change background to #fbfbfb.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3)

issues.title: <html> element must have a lang attribute
issues.description: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute

any.message: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issues.title: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
issues.description:
<html><head>
<title>Replicate</title>...</html>

original_issue.message: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.

issues.title: `<html>` element does not have a `[lang]` attribute
issues.description: If a page doesn't specify a `lang` attribute, a screen reader assumes that the page is in the default language that the user chose when setting up the screen reader. If the page isn't actually in the default language, then the screen reader might not announce the page's text correctly. [Learn more about the `lang` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/html-has-lang).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

issues.title: Images must have alternative text
issues.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.

original_issue.message: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > img

issues.title: Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes
issues.description: Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

all.message: Document does not have a main landmark
